name: Heartsease
description:
Game Overview

Healthcare issue we're tackling:
Stress/Anxiety/Depression

Why is it important?

In a world increasingly more concerned with self image, it is important not to lose yourself. Social media, imposter syndrome, and daily stressors have become a 24 hour problem. It is crucial to continue to love yourself and others to stave off the threat of anxiety, depression and mental instability

Why is our game exciting?

Because it provides a fun and imaginative POV of someone who suffers from stress and anxiety and how we can make this feel a lot less scary

Team Credits

Hayley Fairbanks - Game Developer/Creator Project Management, Producer

Dale Mauldin Game Developer/Lead Programmer Programming and development

Nick Noejovich Game Developer/Programmer Programming and User Interface

Jaquira “Quira” Darling 2D Artist Environmental art design and animation
